channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Boya Notra Uses AI To Transcribe Meetings, Interviews And Lectures Using The Power Of AI

item.title: How To Save A City – Using The “Creatives And The Crazies”
item.description: Nando’s founder Robbie Brozin is bringing his creative energy to resurrecting downtown Johannesburg, South Africa’s de facto commercial capital.

item.title: Blaze Mazinkaiser Figure From Ember Toys Is Now Open For Pre-Orders

item.title: This Brand New American Bank Already Has 127 Million Customers
item.description: Forget Wall Street’s old guard; this massive fintech powerhouse is quietly rewriting the rules of American consumer finance and savings.

item.title: ‘Super Robot Wars Y’ Gets A Big Free Update And Second DLC Set
item.description: Now that a big new update and second DLC set for Super Robot Wars Y have been released, there’s a lot to cover.
